title: FT/FS: Low grade N300 Mayo Pfeffer (price drop 11/30)

posts.post_title: FT/FS: Low grade N300 Mayo Pfeffer (price drop 11/30)
posts.post_content:
I was considering putting together a subset of N300's but decided against it. Have this one available for trade or sale.

Looking for T206's, E90-1, and E90-3 in trades. 

Latham sold. Asking [STRIKE]$90[/STRIKE] [STRIKE]$83[/STRIKE] $70 net for Pfeffer.
